rows.html: Similar to concurrent programming, this game is nondeterministic. Arrows will always move at unpredictable rates. As a result, some solutions may work with some arrow speeds, but not others.

reflections.description: In concurrency, a race condition occurs when multiple threads share data and they try to change it at the same time. Here, it happens when multiple threads try to deliver packages to the same spot at the same time.
